verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> or <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> to the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H4257>Mahalath<s%> <S%H6031>Leannoth,<s%> <S%H4905>Maschil<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the <S%H250>Ezrahite.<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> I have <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> thee:
Let my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: <S%H5186>incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> unto my <S%H7440>cry;<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H7451>troubles:<s%> and my <S%H2416>life<s%> draweth <S%H5060>nigh<s%> unto the <S%H7585>grave.<s%>
I am <S%H2803>counted<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit:<s%> I <S%H1961>am<s%> as a <S%H1397>man<s%> that hath <S%H369>no<s%> strength: <S%H353><s%>

Free <S%H2670><s%> among the <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> that <S%H7901>lie<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou <S%H2142>rememberest<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more:<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> are cut <S%H1504>off<s%> from thy <S%H4480>hand.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>
Thou hast <S%H7896>laid<s%> me in the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H953>pit,<s%> in <S%H4285>darkness,<s%> in the <S%H4688>deeps.<s%>
Thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> lieth <S%H5564>hard<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me, and thou hast <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> me with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H4867>waves.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

Thou hast put <S%H7368>away<s%> mine <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> far <S%H4480>from<s%> me; thou hast <S%H7896>made<s%> me an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto them: I am shut <S%H3607>up,<s%> and I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> come <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H1669>mourneth<s%> by reason <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6040>affliction:<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> upon thee, I have stretched <S%H7849>out<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> unto <S%H413>thee.<s%>
Wilt thou <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H6382>wonders<s%> to the <S%H4191>dead?<s%> shall the <S%H7496>dead<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee? <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Shall thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> be <S%H5608>declared<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave?<s%> or thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> in <S%H11>destruction?<s%>
Shall thy <S%H6382>wonders<s%> be <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark?<s%> and thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5388>forgetfulness?<s%>
But <S%H413>unto<s%> thee have <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7768>cried,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> shall my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H6923>prevent<s%> thee.
LORD, <S%H3068><s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> castest thou <S%H2186>off<s%> my <S%H5315>soul?<s%> why <S%H5641>hidest<s%> thou thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me?
I <S%H589><s%> am <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and ready to <S%H1478>die<s%> from my youth <S%H4480>up:<s%> <S%H5290><s%> while I <S%H5375>suffer<s%> thy <S%H367>terrors<s%> I am <S%H6323>distracted.<s%>
Thy fierce <S%H2740>wrath<s%> <S%H5674>goeth<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me; thy <S%H1161>terrors<s%> have cut me <S%H6789>off.<s%>
They came round <S%H5437>about<s%> me <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> like <S%H4325>water;<s%> they compassed me <S%H5362>about<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
Lover <S%H157><s%> and <S%H7453>friend<s%> hast thou put <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me, and mine <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> into <S%H4285>darkness.<s%>
